DataElement.longName: Subject Age in Days at Last Known Survival Status Count
DataElement.definition: The age in days of the subject when the last known survival status of the subject was captured.

DataElementConcept.longName: Subject Age in Days at Last Known Survival Status
DataElementConcept.definition: A matter or an individual that is observed, analyzed, examined, investigated, experimented upon, or/and treated in the course of a particular study.:Age of subject (in days) at the last known survival status.
DataElementConcept.administrativeNotes:
2/3/25 Upd DEC property to revert to concept C168844 that does specify 'in days', since we had to remove 'Day' From 'Day Count' VD. mr; 
10/16/12 upd DEC property to use new concept that does not specify "in days".  jk 1/6/23 Created for PCDC Aggregated Dictionary. BF;

ConceptualDomain.definition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

1/18/23 Updated UOM to 'day' per CRDC DSS. mr
